title: 7.3 Patch BSOD!
body:
Everything was fine at first, but recently 3 hours later after patch i update it. after playing 1 game my computer went straight to BSOD. 

Here are my specs:
Windows 10 
16gb RAM avexir
GTX1050
intel i5 6300
1tb wd black seagate
asrock fatal1ty b150 gaming k4
it was build 3 months ago

Please help, I have no clue what is causing the issue and I really want to be able to play league! and mainly build this deskto to play league and also asassin creed black flag. I have never had an issue! If this has ever happened to you and you were able to fix it, please tell me how below. I'll try it and tell you if it worked!

replies.body: That's a worrying situation, and can happen if you have bad drivers or hardware.  Hopefully, it's nothing too huge.  If possible, grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs with more details of your specs.  Attach those logs to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help you out individually.  We'll reply back asap to find what's going on!
